thread.title: Kendall Jenner, & Bella Hadid show off figures in NY
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner, Gigi & Bella Hadid show off figures in NY | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Kendall Jenner, & Bella Hadid show off figures in NY
text:
They're stealing the spotlight at New York Fashion Week this year.
And Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid had enviable model figures it appears they don't pay too much attention to their calorie intake.
The duo were spotting grabbing bags of greasy fast food from McDonald's on Wednesday ahead of another huge show, the Michael Kors Collection Fall 2017.
Scroll down for video
Model cravings: Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid had enviable model figures it appears they don't pay too much attention to their calorie intake on Wednesday in New York
Kendall looked supermodel chic before the event wearing denim skinny jeans, animal print booties and a large black T-shirt with the logo of the nWo Wolfpac on it.
She added a pair of cool shades and an oversized jacket to complete her look.
Bella showed off her individual style in a denim mini skirt, opaque tights and over the knee black boots.
She added a black and red striped sweater and denim jacket over the top.
The 20-year-old accessorized with a beret style cap and a little black handbag.
To go! The duo were spotting grabbing bags of greasy fast food from McDonald's ahead of another huge show, the Michael Kors Collection Fall 2017
Do denim like Bella with a frayed hem mini skirt £204.57 RE/DONE high waisted mini skirt at Revolve
Shop it here!
Buy now
With fashion month in full swing it's all eyes on supermodel-of-the-moment Bella Hadid. Here she is darting between shows in New York clad in a striped sweater and knee high boots. But it's the brunette beauty's denim mini skirt that's caught our eye. Not only is it the perfect length to be showing off those elegant pins, it's also in that dreamy, flattering grey wash AND boasts the hard-to-find, cool-not-bedraggled frayed hem.
Bella's mini hails from RE/DONE, a sustainable denim label based in L.A. (brownie points, Bella).
You can shop Bella's exact skirt here, but there are so many great denim mini's on the market. Our bargain buy? Boohoo of course. At just £15 you can get your hands on their Annabelle mini, just like Hadid's.
For more of an investment version, opt for fashion-forward brand Marques Almeida's ruffled number. It's a bit more of a show piece and will have you way ahead of the fash pack.
Click below to see our edit of the best distressed minis...

What a surprise: The staff at the fast food restaurant got quite the surprise as the models ordered at the counter
Photo op! Bella posed for snaps inside the establishment
Balancing act: Bella kept hold of her box purse and cell phone
Model moment: Kendall stepped out in the Big Apple of another show
Nailed it: Kendall looked supermodel chic before the event wearing denim skinny jeans, animal print booties and a large navy blue tee
Nice: She added a pair of cool shades and an oversized jacket to complete her look
Her own thing: Bella showed off her individual style in a denim mini skirt, opaque tights, over the knee black boots and a Zadig & Voltaire cap
Her famous older sister Gigi showed off her fashion credentials in a quirky number.
The 21-year-old tied her famous dirty blonde locks into a low bun whilst donning a pair of designer sunglasses.
Looking fly: She added a black and red striped sweater and denim jacket over the top
Sassy: The in demand model added a cool pair of shades to her fashion savvy look
Standing out: The 20-year-old accessorized with a beret style cap and a little black handbag
She wore a simple base outfit, black trousers and a black shirt but she added a multi style colourful animal print jacket over the top.
Once inside the venue the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star was seen practicing her model catwalk and strutting her stuff on the runway.
The girls were just coming from Kanye's Yeezy Season 5 show.
Like sister like sister: Her famous older sister Gigi showed off her fashion credentials in a quirky number
Rockin' it: She wore a simple base outfit, black trousers and a black shirt but she added a multi style colourful animal print jacket over the top
Get ready: Once inside the venue the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star was seen practicing her model catwalk and strutting her stuff on the runway
They couldn't make the actual show but they made up for it by delivering a tasty McDonald's feast to Kim and Kanye after the show at Pier 59 studios.
'Look at these delivery girls, how cute are these delivery girls!' Kim could be heard exclaiming as the two leggy models handed over a brown bag of fast food snacks.
Yum! They couldn't make the actual show but they made up for it by delivering a tasty McDonald's feast to Kim and Kanye after the show at Pier 59 studios
Appreciative: 'Look at these delivery girls, how cute are these delivery girls!' Kim could be heard exclaiming as the two leggy models handed over a brown bag of fast food snacks
